title: This Month's GTA+ Benefits
headline: This Month's GTA+ Benefits
subtitle: GTA+
content:
In addition to the recurring monthly GTA$500,000 deposited directly into your Maze Bank account, GTA+ Members who've signed up for this month (May 1 - 28) will also receive:

— The Mammoth Mil-Spec (Off-Road)
— 50% off Agency Properties
— 4X GTA$ and RP on Payphone Hits (through May 7)
— 2X GTA$ on Garment Factory income
— 50% off Imani Tech Upgrades
— The Bigness Sketches Shirt and Jeans
— And more

Membership automatically renews monthly, cancel anytime. Visit rsg.ms/gtaplus for more info.
